ExtendedSection.Title: Template JSP with Advanced direct editing

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
As a last step we activate OpenCms' Advanced direct editing feature. Advanced direct editing means that all necessary tools to edit and manage content is available in-place together with the web page you are currently editing.

Just add the tag <cms:enable-ade/> to the head section of your template JSP.

If you now open a page, a Toolbar appears at the top of the page that allows to add new contents, publish changes, set bookmarks, manage image galleries, and much more.

The toolbar has a height of 52 pixels. It is recommended to add a margin of 52 pixels at the top of the page, in order to prevent the toolbar hiding the actual page content.
